title: Esther Perel - A More Nuanced Look at Infidelity in "The State of Affairs"
itunes:title: Esther Perel - A More Nuanced Look at Infidelity in "The State of Affairs"
description:
Couples therapist Esther Perel discusses power and infidelity in her book "The State of Affairs." Originally aired November 2017.
